info.title: Audit Service
info.description: Tenant Management microservice for SaaS control plane

200.description: Array of AuditLog for a specific action prefix

requiresAction.description: Whether additional user action is needed

paymentMethodId.description: Optional payment method ID (uses default if not specified)

requiresAction.description: Whether additional user action is needed

paymentMethodId.description: Optional payment method ID (uses default if not specified)

parameters.name: autoCreatePaymentIntent
parameters.description: If true, automatically creates a Stripe PaymentIntent for this invoice using the tenant default payment method

parameters.name: autoConfirm
parameters.description: If true, immediately attempts to charge the customer (requires autoCreatePaymentIntent=true)

key.description: Role key (used as role name in Keycloak)

200.description: Array of users with the role

User.title: User
User.description: User accounts with multi-tenant support and Keycloak SSO integration

authId.description: Keycloak user UUID for SSO authentication

ContactWithRelations.title: ContactWithRelations
ContactWithRelations.description: contacts belonging to a tenant (tsType: ContactWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

isPrimary.description: boolean value denoting if the contact is a primary contact for it's tenant.

tenantId.description: tenant id this contact belongs to

ResourceWithRelations.title: ResourceWithRelations
ResourceWithRelations.description: model for resources that are provisioned for a tenant (tsType: ResourceWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

externalIdentifier.description: identifier for the resource in the external system it was provisioned

type.description: type of the resource like storage, compute, etc

metadata.description: any type specific metadata of the resource like connection info, size, etc

tenantId.description: id of the tenant for which this resource is provisioned

AddressWithRelations.title: AddressWithRelations
AddressWithRelations.description: this model represents the address of a company or lead (tsType: AddressWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

LeadWithRelations.title: LeadWithRelations
LeadWithRelations.description: this model represents a lead that could eventually be a tenant in the system (tsType: LeadWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

isValidated.description: whether the lead`s email has been validated or not

addressId.description: id of the address of the lead

TenantWithRelations.title: TenantWithRelations
TenantWithRelations.description: main model of the service that represents a tenant in the system, either pooled or siloed (tsType: TenantWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

status.description: status of a tenant, it can be - 0(active), 1(provisioning),2(deprovisioning),3(inactive)

key.description: a short string used to identify a tenant. This is also used as the namespace and subdomain for this particular tenant. Must be 2-10 lowercase alphanumeric characters.

spocUserId.description: user id of the admin user who acts as a spoc for this tenant.

items.description: array of domains that are allowed for this tenant

identityProvider.description: identity provider type for this tenant - keycloak, auth0, or cognito

leadId.description: id of the lead from which this tenant was generated. this is optional as a tenant can be created without this lead.

addressId.description: id of the address of the tenant

UserRoleWithRelations.title: UserRoleWithRelations
UserRoleWithRelations.description: User role assignments with support for tenant, workspace, and project level permissions (tsType: UserRoleWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

roleKey.description: Role identifier (admin, member, billing_manager, viewer, etc.)

items.description: Array of permission codes granted by this role

scopeType.description: Scope of the role: tenant (org-wide), workspace, or project

scopeId.description: NULL for tenant-level roles, otherwise references workspace or project

UserActivityWithRelations.title: UserActivityWithRelations
UserActivityWithRelations.description: User activity log for audit trail and user behavior tracking (tsType: UserActivityWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

entityType.description: Type of entity affected by the action (user, tenant, subscription, etc.)

metadata.description: JSON metadata containing additional context (changed fields, IP, user agent, etc.)

UserWithRelations.title: UserWithRelations
UserWithRelations.description: User accounts with multi-tenant support and Keycloak SSO integration (tsType: UserWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

authId.description: Keycloak user UUID for SSO authentication

UserPartial.title: UserPartial
UserPartial.description: User accounts with multi-tenant support and Keycloak SSO integration (tsType: Partial<User>, schemaOptions: { partial: true })

authId.description: Keycloak user UUID for SSO authentication

UserRole.title: UserRole
UserRole.description: User role assignments with support for tenant, workspace, and project level permissions

roleKey.description: Role identifier (admin, member, billing_manager, viewer, etc.)

items.description: Array of permission codes granted by this role

scopeType.description: Scope of the role: tenant (org-wide), workspace, or project

scopeId.description: NULL for tenant-level roles, otherwise references workspace or project

AssignRole.title: AssignRole
AssignRole.description: User role assignments with support for tenant, workspace, and project level permissions (tsType: Omit<UserRole, 'id' | 'userId' | 'createdOn' | 'modifiedOn' | 'deleted'>, schemaOptions: { title: 'AssignRole', exclude: [ 'id', 'userId', 'createdOn', 'modifiedOn', 'deleted' ] })

roleKey.description: Role identifier (admin, member, billing_manager, viewer, etc.)

items.description: Array of permission codes granted by this role

scopeType.description: Scope of the role: tenant (org-wide), workspace, or project

scopeId.description: NULL for tenant-level roles, otherwise references workspace or project

UserInvitation.title: UserInvitation
UserInvitation.description: User invitation tokens with role assignment and expiration tracking

token.description: Secure random token embedded in invitation link

roleKey.description: Initial role to assign upon acceptance

lastEmailSentAt.description: Timestamp of last email sent (for cooldown enforcement)

resendCount.description: Number of times invitation has been resent

UserInvitationWithRelations.title: UserInvitationWithRelations
UserInvitationWithRelations.description: User invitation tokens with role assignment and expiration tracking (tsType: UserInvitationWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

token.description: Secure random token embedded in invitation link

roleKey.description: Initial role to assign upon acceptance

lastEmailSentAt.description: Timestamp of last email sent (for cooldown enforcement)

resendCount.description: Number of times invitation has been resent

Tenant.title: Tenant
Tenant.description: main model of the service that represents a tenant in the system, either pooled or siloed

status.description: status of a tenant, it can be - 0(active), 1(provisioning),2(deprovisioning),3(inactive)

key.description: a short string used to identify a tenant. This is also used as the namespace and subdomain for this particular tenant. Must be 2-10 lowercase alphanumeric characters.

spocUserId.description: user id of the admin user who acts as a spoc for this tenant.

items.description: array of domains that are allowed for this tenant

identityProvider.description: identity provider type for this tenant - keycloak, auth0, or cognito

leadId.description: id of the lead from which this tenant was generated. this is optional as a tenant can be created without this lead.

addressId.description: id of the address of the tenant

NewTenantOnboarding.title: NewTenantOnboarding
NewTenantOnboarding.description: model describing payload used to create and onboard a tenant (tsType: Omit<TenantOnboardDTO, >, schemaOptions: { title: 'NewTenantOnboarding', exclude: [] })

contact.description: contacts belonging to a tenant (tsType: Omit<Contact, 'tenantId' | 'id'>, schemaOptions: { exclude: [ 'tenantId', 'id' ] })
contact.title: ContactExcluding_tenantId-id_

isPrimary.description: boolean value denoting if the contact is a primary contact for it's tenant.

zip.description: zip code of the tenant owner

key.description: Unique tenant key. Must be 2-10 lowercase alphanumeric characters, starting with a letter. Used as database schema name and subdomain.

domains.description: Domains associated with the tenant. If not provided, defaults to key-based domain.

adminEmail.description: Admin email address for the tenant. Used to create the initial admin user.

planId.description: Plan ID to associate with this tenant subscription.

TenantOnboardDTO.title: TenantOnboardDTO
TenantOnboardDTO.description: model describing payload used to create and onboard a tenant

contact.description: contacts belonging to a tenant (tsType: Omit<Contact, 'tenantId' | 'id'>, schemaOptions: { exclude: [ 'tenantId', 'id' ] })
contact.title: ContactExcluding_tenantId-id_

isPrimary.description: boolean value denoting if the contact is a primary contact for it's tenant.

zip.description: zip code of the tenant owner

key.description: Unique tenant key. Must be 2-10 lowercase alphanumeric characters, starting with a letter. Used as database schema name and subdomain.

domains.description: Domains associated with the tenant. If not provided, defaults to key-based domain.

adminEmail.description: Admin email address for the tenant. Used to create the initial admin user.

planId.description: Plan ID to associate with this tenant subscription.

TenantPartial.title: TenantPartial
TenantPartial.description: main model of the service that represents a tenant in the system, either pooled or siloed (tsType: Partial<Tenant>, schemaOptions: { partial: true })

status.description: status of a tenant, it can be - 0(active), 1(provisioning),2(deprovisioning),3(inactive)

key.description: a short string used to identify a tenant. This is also used as the namespace and subdomain for this particular tenant. Must be 2-10 lowercase alphanumeric characters.

spocUserId.description: user id of the admin user who acts as a spoc for this tenant.

items.description: array of domains that are allowed for this tenant

identityProvider.description: identity provider type for this tenant - keycloak, auth0, or cognito

leadId.description: id of the lead from which this tenant was generated. this is optional as a tenant can be created without this lead.

addressId.description: id of the address of the tenant

Subscription.title: Subscription
Subscription.description: Subscription model representing tenant subscriptions to plans

tenantId.description: ID of the tenant this subscription belongs to

planId.description: ID of the plan (e.g., plan-basic, plan-standard, plan-premium)

cancelAtPeriodEnd.description: Whether subscription will cancel at end of period

valueType.description: Data type of the value for proper parsing

isPublic.description: Whether this setting is visible to non-admin users

NewSetting.title: NewSetting
NewSetting.description: Platform settings and configuration (tsType: Omit<Setting, 'id' | 'createdOn' | 'modifiedOn' | 'createdBy' | 'modifiedBy'>, schemaOptions: { title: 'NewSetting', exclude: [ 'id', 'createdOn', 'modifiedOn', 'createdBy', 'modifiedBy' ] })

valueType.description: Data type of the value for proper parsing

isPublic.description: Whether this setting is visible to non-admin users

SettingPartialExcluding_id-configKey-cre.title: SettingPartialExcluding_id-configKey-createdOn-createdBy_
SettingPartialExcluding_id-configKey-cre.description: Platform settings and configuration (tsType: Omit<Partial<Setting>, 'id' | 'configKey' | 'createdOn' | 'createdBy'>, schemaOptions: { partial: true, exclude: [ 'id', 'configKey', 'createdOn', 'createdBy' ] })

valueType.description: Data type of the value for proper parsing

isPublic.description: Whether this setting is visible to non-admin users

NewUserRole.title: NewUserRole
NewUserRole.description: User role assignments with support for tenant, workspace, and project level permissions (tsType: Omit<UserRole, 'id' | 'createdOn' | 'modifiedOn' | 'createdBy' | 'modifiedBy'>, schemaOptions: { title: 'NewUserRole', exclude: [ 'id', 'createdOn', 'modifiedOn', 'createdBy', 'modifiedBy' ] })

roleKey.description: Role identifier (admin, member, billing_manager, viewer, etc.)

items.description: Array of permission codes granted by this role

scopeType.description: Scope of the role: tenant (org-wide), workspace, or project

scopeId.description: NULL for tenant-level roles, otherwise references workspace or project

UserRolePartialExcluding_id-userId-tenan.title: UserRolePartialExcluding_id-userId-tenantId-createdOn-createdBy_
UserRolePartialExcluding_id-userId-tenan.description: User role assignments with support for tenant, workspace, and project level permissions (tsType: Omit<Partial<UserRole>, 'id' | 'userId' | 'tenantId' | 'createdOn' | 'createdBy'>, schemaOptions: { partial: true, exclude: [ 'id', 'userId', 'tenantId', 'createdOn', 'createdBy' ] })

roleKey.description: Role identifier (admin, member, billing_manager, viewer, etc.)

items.description: Array of permission codes granted by this role

scopeType.description: Scope of the role: tenant (org-wide), workspace, or project

scopeId.description: NULL for tenant-level roles, otherwise references workspace or project

SubscriptionPlanWithRelations.title: SubscriptionPlanWithRelations
SubscriptionPlanWithRelations.description: Subscription plan model (tsType: SubscriptionPlanWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

tier.description: Plan tier (FREE, BASIC, STANDARD, PREMIUM, ENTERPRISE)

features.description: List of features included in this plan (stored as JSON array)

isActive.description: Whether this plan is available for subscription

trialEnabled.description: Whether trial is enabled for this plan

tier.description: Plan tier (FREE, BASIC, STANDARD, PREMIUM, ENTERPRISE)

features.description: List of features included in this plan (stored as JSON array)

isActive.description: Whether this plan is available for subscription

trialEnabled.description: Whether trial is enabled for this plan

NewPlan.title: NewPlan
NewPlan.description: Subscription plan model (tsType: Omit<SubscriptionPlan, 'createdOn' | 'modifiedOn' | 'createdBy' | 'modifiedBy'>, schemaOptions: { title: 'NewPlan', exclude: [ 'createdOn', 'modifiedOn', 'createdBy', 'modifiedBy' ] })

tier.description: Plan tier (FREE, BASIC, STANDARD, PREMIUM, ENTERPRISE)

features.description: List of features included in this plan (stored as JSON array)

isActive.description: Whether this plan is available for subscription

trialEnabled.description: Whether trial is enabled for this plan

PaymentMethod.title: PaymentMethod
PaymentMethod.description: Payment methods stored for tenant billing (cards, bank accounts)

tenantId.description: ID of the tenant this payment method belongs to

stripeCustomerId.description: Stripe customer ID (cus_xxx) for this tenant

bankAccountDetails.description: Bank account details (if type is bank_account)

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default payment method for the tenant

billingEmail.description: Email associated with the payment method

billingAddress.description: Billing address for the payment method

PaymentIntent.title: PaymentIntent
PaymentIntent.description: Payment intents tracking payment attempts for invoices

tenantId.description: ID of the tenant this payment intent belongs to

invoiceId.description: ID of the invoice this payment is for

amount.description: Amount in smallest currency unit (cents for USD)

clientSecret.description: Client secret for frontend payment confirmation

description.description: Description of what this payment is for

amountReceived.description: Amount actually received (may differ due to currency conversion)

emailEnabled.description: Whether email notifications are enabled for this category

smsEnabled.description: Whether SMS notifications are enabled for this category

pushEnabled.description: Whether push notifications are enabled for this category

inAppEnabled.description: Whether in-app notifications are enabled for this category

webhookEnabled.description: Whether webhook notifications are enabled for this category

webhookUrl.description: Custom webhook URL for notifications (if webhook_enabled)

NotificationHistory.title: NotificationHistory
NotificationHistory.description: Notification delivery history for audit and analytics

tenantId.description: Tenant this notification was sent for

recipientEmail.description: Email address of recipient (if email channel)

recipientPhone.description: Phone number of recipient (if SMS channel)

openedAt.description: When the notification was opened (if tracked)

clickedAt.description: When a link was clicked (if tracked)

Lead.title: Lead
Lead.description: this model represents a lead that could eventually be a tenant in the system

isValidated.description: whether the lead`s email has been validated or not

addressId.description: id of the address of the lead

CreateLeadDTO.title: CreateLeadDTO
CreateLeadDTO.description: model describing payload used to create a lead (tsType: Omit<CreateLeadDTO, 'isValidated' | 'addressId' | 'id'>, schemaOptions: { title: 'CreateLeadDTO', exclude: [ 'isValidated', 'addressId', 'id' ] })

address.description: this model represents the address of a company or lead (tsType: @loopback/repository-json-schema#Optional<Omit<Address, 'id'>, 'country'>, schemaOptions: { exclude: [ 'id' ], optional: [ 'country' ] })
address.title: AddressOptional_country_Excluding_id_

LeadPartial.title: LeadPartial
LeadPartial.description: this model represents a lead that could eventually be a tenant in the system (tsType: Partial<Lead>, schemaOptions: { partial: true })

isValidated.description: whether the lead`s email has been validated or not

addressId.description: id of the address of the lead

TenantOnboardDto.title: TenantOnboardDto
TenantOnboardDto.description: model describing payload used to create and onboard a tenant (tsType: @loopback/repository-json-schema#Optional<Omit<TenantOnboardDTO, 'contact'>, 'name'>, schemaOptions: { title: 'TenantOnboardDto', exclude: [ 'contact' ], optional: [ 'name' ] })

zip.description: zip code of the tenant owner

key.description: Unique tenant key. Must be 2-10 lowercase alphanumeric characters, starting with a letter. Used as database schema name and subdomain.

domains.description: Domains associated with the tenant. If not provided, defaults to key-based domain.

adminEmail.description: Admin email address for the tenant. Used to create the initial admin user.

planId.description: Plan ID to associate with this tenant subscription.

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: this model represents an invoice with the amount and period generated for a tenant in the system

startDate.description: start date for the period this invoice is generated for

endDate.description: end date for the period this invoice is generated for

invoiceFile.description: option reference to the generated file of the invoice

tenantId.description: id of the tenant this invoice is generated for

NewInvoice.title: NewInvoice
NewInvoice.description: this model represents an invoice with the amount and period generated for a tenant in the system (tsType: Omit<Invoice, 'id'>, schemaOptions: { title: 'NewInvoice', exclude: [ 'id' ] })

startDate.description: start date for the period this invoice is generated for

endDate.description: end date for the period this invoice is generated for

invoiceFile.description: option reference to the generated file of the invoice

tenantId.description: id of the tenant this invoice is generated for

InvoiceWithRelations.description: this model represents an invoice with the amount and period generated for a tenant in the system (tsType: InvoiceWithRelations, schemaOptions: { includeRelations: true })

endDate.description: end date for the period this invoice is generated for

tenantId.description: id of the tenant this invoice is generated for

InvoicePartial.title: InvoicePartial

endDate.description: end date for the period this invoice is generated for

tenantId.description: id of the tenant this invoice is generated for

tenantId.description: tenant id this contact belongs to
